column1: in memory of betty carol hughes -- gassett funeral home| betty carol hughes. october 3
column8: 2015 at the age of 76. graveside services will be held saturday
column10: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at pine view memorial gardens with rev. doug chappelle officiating. gassett funeral home of wetumpka directing. mrs. hughes is preceded in death by her husband
column11: hilton hughes. she is survived by one son
column20: 12 grandchildren and numerous great-grandchildren. visitation will be held friday
column22: 2015 from 6:00 p. m. until 8:00 p. m. at gassett funeral home.
